title: .21 Rejoice! The Canadian Longform Census Is Back
description: Turns out, the Canadian census was a pretty big flashpoint in the recent elections, and the fight over it tells us a lot about why government data matters.

itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, ESPN, Jody Avirgan
itunes:subtitle: Turns out, the Canadian census was a pretty big flashpoint in the recent elections, and the fight over it tells us a lot about why government data matters.
